mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.class_name AS "className", a.department_id AS "departmentId", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_class( id, class_name, department_id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{className}, #{departmentId}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_class SET class_name = #{className}, department_id = #{departmentId}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
